value.fullName: Heavy paraffin: all ribs are full of paraffin and at least 5 gallons of paraffin in front of it
value.label: Heavy paraffin: all ribs are full of paraffin and at least 5 gallons of paraffin in front of it

value.fullName: Moderate paraffin: 2 to 3 ribs are full of paraffin and at least 2 gallons in front of it
value.label: Moderate paraffin: 2 to 3 ribs are full of paraffin and at least 2 gallons in front of it

value.fullName: Light paraffin: 1 rib is full of paraffin with no paraffin in front of the pig
value.label: Light paraffin: 1 rib is full of paraffin with no paraffin in front of the pig

value.fullName: No paraffin: absolutely no paraffin on the pig or in front of the pig
value.label: No paraffin: absolutely no paraffin on the pig or in front of the pig
